To obtain a position in an organization where my skills and experience will be an asset to help the company 
achieve their mission, vision and values
 
 Detail  oriented professional with  6.5 years of experience  in successfully coordinating the activities of 
various departments concerned with various operational activities  
 Expertise in installing, testing, commissioning & maintenance of electrical equipment’s

 Hands on experience in Electrical Breakdowns Which Include SCADA, PLC  and Equipment Failures . 
 Diagnose Malfunctionin g System, Equipment and Electrical Parts, Via Using Test Equipment to Identify 
the Cause of Breakdown  and recommend options for eliminating such problems also.  
 Awarded for best suggestion, felicitated for zero delay and effi cient achievement of production . 
 Demonstrated excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills . 
  Trained and Managed Employees, Ensuring Adherence to Safety Procedures and Maintenance of High 
Quality Service Standards Expected by Management .

 Electrical Troubleshooting  
 Electrical Operation and  Preventive, Predictive & Breakdown Maintenance
